mnd11:52.2: andubandhanena → addubandhanena (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | baddho → bandho (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
mnd11:96.2: dukhañcāpi → dukhaṁ vāpi (bj); dukkhaṁ vāpi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd11:96.4: jāniyāmāti → jānissāma iti (bj); jānissāmāti (si, mr); jāniyāma iti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd11:97.2: vibhāvīyati atikkamīyati samatikkamīyati → vibhāviyyati atikkamiyyati samatikkamiyyati (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); vibhaviyyati atikkamiyyati samatikkamiyyati (cck)
